thread.title: Bryan County landlord accused of shinning lasers at tenant
thread.title_full: Bryan County landlord accused of shinning lasers at tenant | savannahnow.com

author: Jamie Parker
title: Bryan County landlord accused of shinning lasers at tenant
text:
Photos By Jamie Parker A man residing on English Drive in Ellabell reported to the Bryan County Sheriff’s Office that his neighbor was harassing his family.
According to the complainant his neighbor, who he rents a trailer from, is evicting him for not paying his rent.
The man told officers that the neighbor/landlord had previously kicked in his door and that night had been standing at the edge of the property line near his driveway.
He went on to say that he has seen lights and lasers coming from the neighbor’s yard and thinks the man is shining them to intentionally harass his family. The complaint added that he intended to take his landlord to court over their rental agreement.
When contacted the landlord/neighbor told the officers that he had been in bed and did not know what the complainant was talking about.
